short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whack some bots in a fun whack-a-mole style game, demonstrating PerimeterX integration with Chrome Extensions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The old known Whack-a-mole game. But this time whacking bots instead of bots. Hours of fun using your device and also integrated with PerimeterX anti bot software. Graphics designed to make this game intuitive and start playing immediately. Please rate the app as well as leave comments and feedback.
